universum.studios.android.recycler.decoration

Interface RecyclerViewItemDecoration.Precondition

  • Enclosing class:
    RecyclerViewItemDecoration

    public static interface RecyclerViewItemDecoration.Precondition
    Precondition represents a simple check which is performed by an item decoration before its decoration logic is performed for a specific item view.

    In general, preconditions may be used in order to perform more item specific decoration logic.

    Author:
    Martin Albedinsky

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static RecyclerViewItemDecoration.Precondition EMPTY
      Empty implementation (NULL object) which is always satisfied, that is, every item view will be decorated when using this precondition.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean check(View view, RecyclerView parent, RecyclerView.State state)
      Checks whether this precondition is satisfied for the specified parameters.

    • Field Detail

      • EMPTY

        @NonNull
static final RecyclerViewItemDecoration.Precondition EMPTY
        Empty implementation (NULL object) which is always satisfied, that is, every item view will be decorated when using this precondition.

    • Method Detail

      • check

        boolean check(@NonNull
              View view,
              @NonNull
              RecyclerView parent,
              @NonNull
              RecyclerView.State state)
        Checks whether this precondition is satisfied for the specified parameters.
        Parameters:
        view - The currently iterated item view.
        parent - The parent recycler view where is the specified item view presented.
        state - State of the parent recycler view.
        Returns:
        True if this precondition is satisfied and the item view can be decorated, false otherwise.
